contents:
(最后有惊喜）春秋笔法真轻车熟练

一切数据来自政府网站：
http://hsh.sfgov.org/services/emergencyshelter/navigation-centers/

The average length of stay for current Navigation Center clients is 88 days (up from 76 days at the 6-month point)如果你说的这45个床位没有错的话，每年会接待超过四批人，差不多187个人。相反你那这种全天性中心和学校对比才是糊弄智商，师生比不包括后勤人员，哈佛大学教员数量2400但是算上其他雇员数量迅速升到16000，黑屁比较也不带这么比较的。

其次，Navigation Centers and SAFE Navigation Centers do not accept walk-ins. All individuals and couples who enter have been selected by the SF Homeless Outreach Team or a centralized referral system. Because Navigation Centers operate 24×7, there are no lines outside in the evening, and guests are not exited onto the street in the morning.
对，这个中心只接受筛选后的人员，不接受排队等候，也不会在早上将人员踢回街上，吸引周围流浪汉从何而来。现有中心也给出了不会影响邻居的报告：
http://hsh.sfgov.org/wp-content/uploads/2019.03.12-Letter-of-Support-Central-Waterfront-_-Dogpatch-Homeless-Navigation-Center1-2.pdf
辛苦你们还得刻意去污名化中心。

In 2018, the Department of Homelessness and Supportive Housing helped over 2,200 people exit homelessness, and since their launch Navigation Centers helped 46% of their guests end their experience of homelessness after a stay in a Navigation Center.
一个中心每年能从街上去掉85个无家可归的，这些人不会在街上继续给你们添堵你们就觉得马上中产抽大麻喝酒。

给你看看该怎么反对：
https://www.marinatimes.com/2019/04/real-reason-to-stop-navigation-centers-they-dont-work/
所以，反对是要反对的，但是不能这么弱智，也不能一上来“主意是好的，就是我不想要”，干脆的反对了当。
